title: Prohibits the sale or use of styrofoam as a packing material
summary: Prohibits the sale or commercial use of styrofoam, commonly known as "packing peanuts" as a packaging material.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3952

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 31, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M.  of  A.  ENGLEBRIGHT -- read once and referred to the
         Committee on Environmental Conservation

       AN ACT to amend the  environmental  conservation  law,  in  relation  to
         prohibiting the sale or use of styrofoam as a packaging material

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The environmental conservation law is amended by  adding  a
    2  new section 27-0721 to read as follows:
    3  S 27-0721. PROHIBITION ON USE OF STYROFOAM AS PACKAGING MATERIAL.
    4    1. NO PERSON SHALL KNOWINGLY OFFER FOR SALE OR COMMERCIALLY USE STYRO-
    5  FOAM COMMONLY KNOWN AS "PACKING PEANUTS" AS A PACKAGING MATERIAL.
    6    2. THE COMMISSIONER MAY ADOPT SUCH RULES AND REGULATIONS AS ARE NECES-
    7  SARY AND APPROPRIATE TO CARRY OUT THE PURPOSES OF THIS SECTION.
    8    S 2. This act shall take effect on the one hundred eightieth day after
    9  it  shall have become a law; provided, however that the addition, amend-
   10  ment and/or repeal of any rule or regulation necessary for the implemen-
   11  tation of this act on its effective date are authorized and directed  to
   12  be made and completed on or before such date.





        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD05271-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to prohibiting the sale or use of styrofoam as a packaging material
